presets.name: Build Android for current device architecture
Build Android with a specific mode

apk.description: Generate apk file(s) rather than a bundle (`.aab`).
apk.x-deprecated: Use `tasks` option instead, e.g. `tasks=['bundleRelease']` to generate aab, `tasks=['assembleDebug']` to generate apk. Will be removed in Nx 17.

debug.description: Generate a debug build instead of a release build.
debug.x-deprecated: Use `mode` option instead, e.g. `mode='debug'`. Deprecated from @react-native-community/cli. Will be removed in Nx 17.

gradleTask.description: Override default gradle task incase of multi build variants
gradleTask.x-deprecated: Use `tasks` option instead, e.g. `tasks=['assembleDebug']`. Will be removed in Nx 17.

port.description: The port where the packager server is listening on.

tasks.description: Run custom Gradle tasks. By default it's "assembleDebug". Will override passed mode and variant arguments.

activeArchOnly.description: Build native libraries only for the current device architecture for debug builds.

extraParams.description: Custom params passed to gradle build command

interactive.description: Explicitly select build type and flavour to use before running a build

sync.description: Syncs npm dependencies to `package.json` (for React Native autolink).
